tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE stores (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, location POINT)
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, location POINT)
CREATE TABLE store_customers (store_id INT, customer_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (store_id) REFERENCES stores(id), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id))
CREATE TABLE radius_search_results (store_id INT, customer_id INT, distance FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE store_locations (
  store_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  store_name VARCHAR(255),
  store_location GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  customer_location GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  order_date TIMESTAMP,
  total_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE distance_metrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  store_id UUID,
  customer_id UUID,
  distance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE spatial_queries (
  query_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  query_name VARCHAR(255),
  store_id UUID,
  search_radius DECIMAL
)
